channel.title: Need help creating software to make private servers
channel.description:
Hi everyone who's reading this post my name is rilind and i whant to make a software in visual bassics that works like this: -first it gives you a option on what kind of server you want to make example 317, 508,... -then it gives you a list with all kinds of source files (servers) -then it asks you your name of your server (so it edits the name of your server in the log in screen welcome screen,...) -then it asks you your owner account name and adds him the commands to do ::admin ::mod and all the others -then it asks you your ip address so it adds on the client -then it autouploads the cache file (zip,rar) onto a website and adds that link into your client.java -then it compiles the client and it makes it into a jar file
THATS HOW I Want IT TO BE BUT I'M STILL WORKING ON IT AND ITS GOING TO BE A VERY HARD THINK TO DO SO DON'T EXPECT THIS TO BE ALREADY THERE! if you whant to help me ocntact me
website: www.riip.net msn: r_i_338@hotmail.com
DON'T HAVE TIME TO READ MY EMAILS SO PLEASE DON'T SEND ANY
OKE I DIDN'T HAVE TIME TO FINISH BUT I MADE IT WORK BUT NOT LIKE IN THE DESCRIPTION ^^ BUT STILL IT WORKS ITS NOT PERFUCT BUT YEA SO I'M GIVING THE FILE AWAY BECAUSE DON'T HAVE THE TIME TO FINISH IT ITS A VISUAL BASIC FILE FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS IN THE README TO MAKE IT WORK I WISH THE PERSON WHO WHANTS TO FINISH THIS GOOD LUCK
http://adf.ly/4Qtz
COPY AND PASTE THIS URL IN YOUR WEBBROWSER

item.title: Need help creating software to make private servers
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“riip, post:1, topic:351151”]Hi everyone who’s reading this post my name is rilind and i whant to make a software in visual bassics that works like this:
-first it gives you a option on what kind of server you want to make example 317, 508,…
-then it gives you a list with all kinds of source files (servers)
-then it asks you your name of your server (so it edits the name of your server in the log in screen welcome screen,…)
-then it asks you your owner account name and adds him the commands to do ::admin ::mod and all the others
-then it asks you your ip address so it adds on the client
-then it autouploads the cache file (zip,rar) onto a website and adds that link into your client.java
-then it compiles the client and it makes it into a jar file

THATS HOW I Want IT TO BE BUT I’M STILL WORKING ON IT AND ITS GOING TO BE A VERY HARD THINK TO DO SO DON’T EXPECT THIS TO BE ALREADY THERE! if you whant to help me ocntact me

website: www.riip.net
msn: r_i_338@hotmail.com

DON’T HAVE TIME TO READ MY EMAILS SO PLEASE DON’T SEND ANY[/quote]This Is actually a good idea, It will help alot of new coders Rep++

Read full topic
